name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in developing high-performance applications. Proficient in **C#**, **Angular**, and **T-SQL**, with a strong foundation in **Microservices** and **Service Fabric** architectures. Demonstrated experience in deploying cloud solutions and enhancing **IT Security** measures. Skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that align with business goals.

Beyond core technical skills, I bring extensive experience in **AI/ML** development and predictive analytics platforms. My technical toolkit includes **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, with a robust proficiency in both frontend and backend technologies, such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experience with cloud services on **AWS** and **Azure**, complemented by a strong understanding of CI/CD practices. Committed to compliance-driven development, ensuring adherence to industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS.
